name: points-converter
description: Convert between loyalty points programs with current exchange rates

scripts.validate-data: node --input-type=module -e "import DataValidator from './scripts/lib/validator.js'; import fs from 'fs'; const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./public/data/conversions.json', 'utf8')); const validator = new DataValidator(); const report = validator.generateReport(data); console.log(report.summary.valid ? 'Valid' : 'Invalid:', report.summary.totalIssues, 'issues'); process.exit(report.summary.valid ? 0 : 1);"
scripts.backup-data: node --input-type=module -e "import BackupManager from './scripts/lib/backup.js'; const backup = new BackupManager('./public/data/conversions.json'); const result = backup.createBackup('manual'); console.log(result.success ? 'Backup created:' : 'Backup failed:', result.filename || result.error);"
scripts.edit-data: echo 'Remember to update lastUpdated in public/data/conversions.json' && $EDITOR public/data/conversions.json
